message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $10,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the deal, $11,000 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still willing to work with you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you and my original asking price. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
